I want to be notified about any new recalls issued by the Department of Agriculture.

dialogue.System: So you want to be notified about new recalls from the Department of Agriculture specifically regarding "Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination"?
dialogue.User: Yes, I would like to receive notifications only for recalls related to “Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination”.

dialogue.System: Great. And how would you like me to notify you when a recall matching your query is found?
dialogue.User: Send me an email.

dialogue.System: Okay, I will send you an email when a recall is found. What subject and body would you like for those emails?
dialogue.User:
The subject should be 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and the body should be '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

Belief State.action_fields: Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML)

'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'

dialogue.User: I want to send notifications to my Android device when a specific event happens.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've set up notifications for your Android device, what kind of music would you like to play when the event occurs?
dialogue.User: I want to play music and specifically, I’d like it to be a relaxing playlist.

dialogue.System: Perfect! So you want to play a relaxing playlist on your device when notified. Is there anything else I can help you with regarding this setup?
dialogue.User: No, that’s everything for now. Thank you!

dialogue.System: Great! Now, regarding the Cookit event, what do you want to happen when your Cookit starts?
dialogue.User: I want to play a relaxing playlist on my device when the Cookit starts.

dialogue.System: So, when your Cookit starts and you want to play a relaxing playlist, do you want this to apply to a specific kitchen?
dialogue.User: Yes, please set the Kitchen ID to 'kitchen'.
I want to receive an email notification based on weather updates from Weather Underground.

dialogue.System: So, to finalize sending this weather update email via Gmail, could you confirm the recipient's address, any CC or BCC recipients, and the subject/body content along with attachment if needed?
dialogue.User:
The recipient is john.doe@example.com, there are no CC or BCC recipients, the subject is 'Tomorrow's Weather in Los Angeles', the body is '

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

', and the attachment URL is https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf.

dialogue.User: I want to automatically post a tweet with an image whenever I save a new item on Pocket.

dialogue.System: Great! Since you want to automatically tweet new Pocket items with an image, are there any specific criteria for these items? For instance, do you want to filter by tags or other attributes before posting?
dialogue.User: No, I don't need any filtering. Just post every new item saved on Pocket as a tweet with its associated image.

dialogue.System: Okay, so you want every new Pocket item with an image to be automatically tweeted. What Twitter account should I use to post these tweets?
dialogue.User: I want you to use my Twitter account for these tweets.

dialogue.System: Great! So I'll post "Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]" along with the image from https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D" to your Twitter account. Is that correct?
dialogue.User: Yes, please use the text and image provided for my tweets on Twitter.

dialogue.System: You mentioned you'd like information from Weather Underground. What specifically about tomorrow’s weather are you interested in?
dialogue.User: I'd like tomorrow’s weather report.

dialogue.System: Great! To get tomorrow’s weather report, what time and location are you interested in?
dialogue.User: I'd like the report at 08:00 for Los Angeles, which is located at 34.0522° N, 118.2437° W.

dialogue.System: So, after getting the weather report for Los Angeles at 8 AM, would you like me to send an email with the details? Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!
